tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cavity Filling,
review: What I really like about Dr. Kamakshi mam is her remarkable clarity. She cuts to the chase and does the right thing to fix the problem. She looks from the patient‚Äôs point of view and recommends only those that are absolutely necessary to fix the issue. Not to mention that she does all this in the most affordable way. Glad to have found amidst a myriad of dentists in the city!

tags: None
review: I highly recommend Dr Kamakshi and her team. I had excruciating pain and they advised to remove my wisdom tooth.  Their diagnosis  and treatment was perfect. To top it , their treatment cost is reasonably priced.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Implant Fixing,Cosmetic Filling,
review: Have been to many dentists in the past *** ******* **** ***** *** ***** I m writing this review after waiting for some time after treatment to give a honest opinion. I was referred to Dr Kamakshi by my friend and went through all the reviews before visiting her. Was given genuine suggestions regarding the problems I had with clear explanation on advantages and disadvantages of each and cost for each was informed prior. For the expertise the implant cost or for the other treatmens the cost was much reasonable. They look in to fixing the problem for long time rather than treating it for time being. There was complete transparency at each step. The entire team is very warm and welcoming and they do check up the next day after the treatment. There was one review mentioning how there are so many dental clinics in each street and how we need to choose one. It's so true. Since the location is interior I wasn't aware of it now I m recommending to all known to me. Good job team Lumident. Thanks for fixing my teeth.

tags: None
review:
Let me give you an honest review. I visited Dr. Kamakshi after doing  lot of search on practo. I was little bit confused because of past experiences with other dentists. After initial check up , she provided review on my teeth and suggested me for few treatments which are actually required. I was little bit negligent after that and suddenly pain started in my tooth(after 2 months) and it was unbearable. I visited the doctor again and she suggested me same treatment. 3days back, i got the tooth extracted and it was easy process and i didn't feel much discomfort. They made me feel ease and handling was good during the process. After extraction, pain subsided from next day and really feeling comfortable today. 
I can suggest those who are facing any kind of dental problems, try to get resolved in the initial stage itself , don't delay as i did. Dr. Kamakshi is very good, cool, and experienced doctor. *** ***** *** *** **** ********* *** only suggests if it's really required.  Dr.Kamakshi is a very good dentist in my opinion. I am giving this review so that it will be useful to others people who are really in search of good dentists. These days i see in every street there are 3-4 dental clinics and we need to choose the best one Dr. Kamakshi is good in treatment, affordable and cool doctor.
reply_text: Thank you sir for such a detailed feedback.

tags: None
review:
Dr Kamakshi was very kind and professional. The most important thing is she keeps following it up with her patients very often and she is reachable all the time, I have been to many dentist but never seen such a kind doctor. even after the treatment I kept asking for her advice at 12 in the night but as soon as she receives my message I will get a reply instantly without any delay that too with a smiley.There are very few doctors like her and she is the first doctor where I have seen with such kindness and professionalism.

Great going doctor and all the very best, may god bless u.

Regards,
Ragav
reply_text: Thank you Mr Ragav. Your satisfaction and well wishes matter a lot to us.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Value for money,
review: *** ******** ** *** ** *** **** ******** **** ******* ** ** ***. She did a great job with dental fillings for my wife and myself, and root canal for my elder son. She takes the time to explain the problem clearly and and answers all questions that one may have. She takes extreme care of her patients and the thing that stands out is her attention to detail. No sharp edges on the filling, surface neatly polished so that there absolutely no discomfort to the patient. I highly recommend Dr. Kamakshi for her flawless work.

tags: Wait time,
context: Dental Fillings,Dental Surgery,Dental Treatment,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review: If you want to resolve ur issue not only for now and in future like 3-5 years laters also.. straight away take a root to lumident. Here the treatment is not like you are paying and we are serving. Its a lot more than that. You will get clear cut picture of ur issue and then the steps to be done to overcome it. No un necessary things/medicines apart from the issue. Especially doc will be in touch even after treatment to know the status. Clinic is in very decent and reachable area so you can go ahead with lumi'dent' if you don't wanna see any 'dent' on ur teeth.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: After braces I had a gap between my canine and premolar teeth in my upper jaw. I was told it'll close if I wear retainers and it never did for more than five years as the gap was more. I used to restrict my smile because of this and I was always self conscious. In my hometown they said no other option is available than wearing retainers which we obviously despise. Then I came to know about Dr. Kamakshi through a sister of mine. The first visit with her gave me hope that this can be treated. She said using crown on all the four teeth will close the gap. She took pics for my smile, did digital work on them and sent me the picture showing this is how it'll look after the treatment which gave me an idea. She explained everything clearly and politely and left the decision to me if I need this or not. After that I came for 2 sittings. One for measurement and temporary fix and the other for the final fitting and fillings. No one can differentiate between the real teeth and the crown. The teeth color is perfect and the size and shape are perfect too. I'm so happy with the result and the entire team was patient and caring throughout the entire process. Kindly visit her if you don't think you can fix something and she will tell you otherwise üòâüëç

This dental clinic truly excels in creating a transparent and friendly environment, and I highly commend them for their exceptional service.

review: Have been visiting lumident since last 5 yrs for multiple dental problems. What I liked was the passion in which she treats the patients, entire team is very cooperative and treat you with kindness. I have undergone root canal,implants and many more which are perfectly fine till now. Fees are reasonable for the quality of treatment provided. Location is in residential area but you can easily locate through maps or directions provided from the clinic. Though I have moved out of this place I still visit her once in 6mons for review which says about the quality of treatment.
